name: Louis MILLER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Miller v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Louis MILLER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of March, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

895 A.2d 520
